plot outline: Dandupalyam is a gang of psychopaths, who for their lust and desire for money can go to any extent. They start to kill people in the most brutal way possible. This gang is directly involved in close to 80 criminal cases. During which, a rude police officer works his way around the gang members and tries to prove them guilty in law.
title: Dandupalya 3
plot: It tells the tale of the Dandupalya gang from the point of view of the police.

Dandupalyam is a gang of psychopaths, who for their lust and desire for money can go to any extent. They start to kill people in the most brutal way possible. This gang is directly involved in close to 80 criminal cases. During which, a rude police officer works his way around the gang members and tries to prove them guilty in law.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
